text: William Ingraham Koch (; born May 3, 1940) is an American billionaire businessman, sailor, and collector. His boat was the winner of the America's Cup in 1992. Koch's net worth was at $1.8 billion in 2019. David Koch (1940−2019) was his twin brother. His other brothers are Frederick R. Koch (1933−2020) and Charles Koch (born 1935). ==References== Category:1940 births Category:Living people Category:Twin people from the United States Category:Businesspeople from Wichita, Kansas Category:American billionaires
title: Bill Koch (businessman)
